thread.title: California drops plan to let violent inmates fight fires

title: California drops plan to let violent inmates fight fires
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
California corrections officials are dropping a proposal to allow prisoners with violent backgrounds to work in the state's inmate firefight...
